price: Akasema: Mnanibashiria nami uzee umenishika! Basi kwa njia gani mnanibashiria?
arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرۡتُمُونِي عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِيَ ٱلۡكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
footnotes: Akasema: Vipi mnanibashiria mtoto na hali mimi nimekwisha patikana na udhaifu wa ukongwe. Kwa njia gani, basi, mnanibashiria jambo hili la ajabu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla abashartumūnī ʿalā an massaniya al-kibaru fabima tubashirūna
translations: Do you give me glad tidings
Do you give me glad tidings
